name: SleepSoundsDogs
0:
”Alexa, open sleep sounds dogs”
”Alexa, start sleep sounds dogs”
”Alexa, launch sleep sounds dogs”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep sounds dogs
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Sounds Dogs lets you reproduce relaxing audio tracks that will relax your dogs. This skill will calm you and your dog and make you feel better.

To add this skill on your Alexa Routines, please do the following:

Enable this Alexa skill. 
On Alexa app, navigate to Routines. 
Click + to add a new routine. 
Click + for "When this happens" and choose one. 
Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills". 
Choose "Your Skills". 
Select this skill. 
Click Next. 
Choose Device to perform the routine to. 
Click Save. 

Stay updated on Smart Skills also on Instagram! 
Smart Skills - (@smartskills.it)
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
